attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: put pressure on the Irish government to amend the their national flag so that it is only green and white. Although they have removed Articles 2 and 3 from their constitution, the orange on the flag is still a claim to the 6 counties of Northern Ireland, and offensive to Unionists.

rejection.details: The title should be call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
